name: Stellar Sunset
description:
A short retro stylized story in space
You are a little drone on an abandoned space station. Try to find your drone-friend fighting with a mysterious observer and cubes of trash.
Playtime ~10min

Controls:

  • WASD / Mouse - move
  • Space - jump
  • LMB - attack
  • E - spawn trash cube
  • L - flashlight
  • Esc - pause and see controls
  • Alt+F4 or kill the boss drone - exit the game 

All the code, models, music was made in ~50 hours. tbh it's the first project I was working so hard on. So I really hope you enjoy!

Also, the game will get an update on the next week so keep in touch.
